name: A large magic infused brass necklace
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration astoundingly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users magical resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
